animeTitle: Jiang Jun Di Xiao Chong Yi
synopsis: She is the War Goddess. She is Death. She is the soul of hundreds of troops. She fought for her country, but her mom was framed and killed. She swore revenge, however, she found a dreadful plot behind it. He is a swordsman. He is a miracle doctor. He is also a perfect spy. He is gentle and loyal. He came to her with his intention, but healed her all wounds and fell in love with her unconsciously.
